class.name: FormNeedsUppercaseCharacterFieldEntry
class.brief_description: Checks if the given html form field's value has an uppercase character.
class.description: Used by [FormField]s to implement html form validation capabilities. Checks if the given html form field's value has an uppercase character.

member.name: does_not_have_uppercase_error
member.default: "%s needs at least one uppercase character!"
